scripts.db:console: docker compose run db psql -h db -U postgres -d noelevator_dev
scripts.docker:db:migrate: docker compose run backend npx knex migrate:latest
scripts.docker:db:migrate:undo: docker compose run backend npx knex migrate:down
scripts.rebuild:be: docker compose build backend && docker compose rm --force --stop backend && docker compose up -d backend
scripts.docker:seed:dev: docker compose run backend npx ts-node scripts/seed/dev.ts
